title: Unauthorized Access to Basic Auth Page
preconditions: User is on the Basic Auth page (https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth)
User has not provided valid credentials for authorization
main_flow: System checks if user has provided valid credentials for authorization
User presses the Cancel button instead of entering credentials
4. System displays the "Not authorized" message and the page remains unchanged
postconditions: User remains on the Basic Auth page
User is unable to access protected resources without proper authorization.
